Package de.uni_stuttgart.ims.corpus.unlabeled.epinions

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    EpinionsCleaner
    Take the original epinions file provided by Branavan, Chen, Eisenstein, Barzilay (2009) in "Learning Document-Level Semantic Properties from Free-Text Annotations" downloaded from http://groups.csail.mit.edu/rbg/code/precis/ Convert to valid XML and UTF-8 encoding.
    ExtractSentencesFromXML
    Extract all sentences and texts from review in XML file in format (Branavan, Chen, Eisenstein, Barzilay 2009)
    ExtractSentencesFromXML.EpinionsReviewHandler
    Read the XML files in format (Branavan, Chen, Eisenstein, Barzilay 2009) 20 "Entry Level" 2006/8/25 Battery Life5.0 Portability4.0 Clarity5.0 Durability4.0 Product Rating5.0 carl zeiss lens minolta would have attracted more photographers Using the Sony name will probably give it an "entry level" status.
